_description: For my dog ([Cutt] name illegible) — one couplet

BodRawC572.Transcription:
Ihesus marcy Lady helpefor cutt my dogge ys a parillus
                    welp
BodRawC572.Editions:
Smalley,  Beryl. 
             “Which William of Nottingham?” 
             Mediaeval and Renaissance Studies
         3 (1953): 201-2: 226.
